select count(*) as ordercount , sum(totalprice) as ordertotalprice from orders where user_no=#{userNo}

select o.order_no as oorder_no , o.user_no as ouser_no , name , phone , p_name , p.p_no as pp_no , thumbnail , o.status as ostatus , address || postcode as delivery , order_date , totalPrice from orders o left join d_order d on(o.order_no = d.order_no) left join product p on(d.p_no = p.p_no) where o.user_no = #{userNo} order by o.order_no desc
